translation.en: -[discordant alarm tone] -[beeping continues]
[nurse] Can I get some help in here?
[voice over PA] Code Blue, section 12.
translation.zh: 第十二病区 紧急情况

translation.en: Code Blue… [nurse] I need some help, please!
translation.zh:
-第十二病区 紧急情况
-这里需要帮助！

translation.en: [nurse 2] What's going on?
[nurse] Came in, he was seizing, then he started coding.
translation.zh:
我进来时 发现他在抽搐
然后出现了心脏骤停

translation.en: -[nurse 2] I'll get the bag. -[nurse 3] What's going on, Charlie?
translation.zh:
-我去拿诊疗包
-什么情况 查理？

translation.en: [Charlie] I came in, he was seizing, he went into V-tach, and then he coded.
translation.zh:
我进来时他在抽搐
出现室性心动过速和心脏骤停

translation.en: -Let's swap compressions. -[Charlie] Okay.
[nurse 3] In three, two, one…
translation.zh: 倒数 三 二 一

translation.en: -[nurse 2] Good swap. -[PA] Section 12…
[nurse 2] Breath, two, three, four…
translation.zh: 呼吸 二 三 四…

translation.en: [doctor] Okay, what's going on in here?
[Charlie] I heard the alarm from the hall. I came in and saw he was seizing,
translation.zh:
我在大厅听到了警报声
进来后发现他在抽搐

translation.en: silenced the vent, noticed he was in V-tach,
translation.zh:
我关了呼吸机警报
他出现室性心动过速

translation.en: and then he went asystolic.
translation.zh:
-接着他就心脏骤停了
-开始按压

translation.en: -[nurse 2] Compressions. -[nurse 3] Watch out.
translation.zh:
-接着他就心脏骤停了
-开始按压 注意身后的小推车

translation.en: No epi yet. He's about a minute into compressions.
translation.zh:
尚未注射肾上腺素
按压已持续约一分钟

translation.en: Okay. Let's get the epi started, please, and let's pause in a minute for a pulse check.
translation.zh:
好的 开始注射肾上腺素
一分钟后暂停检查下脉搏

translation.en: [nurse 3] Copy that.
[nurse 2] Breath.
Quick compressions.
-[nurse 3] 12, 13, 14, 15. -[nurse 2] Breath.
-Breath, two. -[nurse 3] Two, three.
-[nurse 2] Breath. -[nurse 3] Six, seven, eight, nine, ten…
Let's pause for a pulse check.
[nurse 3] 14, 15. No pulse.
-Is that a shockable rhythm? -Yeah, it's shockable.
translation.zh:
-这是可电击复律心律吗？
-是的

translation.en: -Uh, let's charge 150 joules. -[nurse 3] Charging.
-[nurse 2] Breath. -[nurse 3] Ten, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15.
-[nurse 2] Quick compressions. -Come on.
[nurse 3] Five, six… -[defibrillator whirring] -Keeping compressions.
-Clear for the shock. -[nurse 2] You all clear? -Clear. -[defibrillation thumps]
translation.zh:
-让开 准备使用除颤仪
-都让开了 安全

translation.en: Back on the chest. Let's get another round of epi, please.
translation.zh:
继续按压胸口
再注射一支肾上腺素

translation.en: -A little deeper with our compressions. -[nurse 2] Breath.
translation.zh: 按压得更深一点 呼吸

translation.en: Breath. Hold.
-Keep your compressions. -[doctor] Talk to me.
translation.zh: 快速按压 跟我说句话

translation.en: -[nurse 2] Good compressions. -[nurse 3] Breath, two, three, four.
-[nurse 2] Breath. -[nurse 3] 13, 14, 15.
-[nurse 2] Breath. -[doctor] Can I get an epi standing by?
translation.zh:
-呼吸
-能准备一支肾上腺素备用吗？

translation.en: [nurse 3] Four, five, six, seven…
-[doctor] And charge. -[nurse 3] Ten, 11, 12, 13.
-[doctor] All right, let's pull back. -[nurse 2] All clear. All is clear.
translation.zh:
-好了 都退后
-安全 -安全
-安全

translation.en: -[doctor] All clear. -[beeping]
-[defibrillation thumps] -[doctor] Back on.
-[nurse 3] Three, two, one… -[nurse 2] Breath.
-[nurse 2] Breath. -[doctor] Faster compressions, please.
translation.zh: 按压得再快点 拜托了

translation.en: [nurse 2] Breath.
[doctor] 200 joules. Let's hit him.
[nurse 2] Breath.
-Breath. -[beeping]
-[doctor] Hit him again. -[defibrillation thumps]
[doctor] Back on.
[nurse 2] Breath.
-[nurse 3] I'm not getting anything. -[nurse 2] Breath.
-[doctor] Fuck. -[nurse 3] Three, four, five…
-[nurse 2] Easing compressions. -[nurse 3] Eight, nine, ten, 11, 12, 13…
-[doctor] All right. -[nurse 3] 14, 15. [doctor] He's had enough.
translation.zh: 好了 他受的苦已经够多了

translation.en: Mark the time of death. And let's call his wife.
translation.zh: 记下死亡时间 给他妻子打电话吧

translation.en: -[patient groans softly] -[nurse] Almost there.
-How long have you two been married? -Three years.
Wow. Couple o' newlyweds.
translation.zh: 哇 原来是新婚夫妇啊

translation.en: You know, baby, I love you so much.
All right. I have got it.
translation.zh: 好了 我这边完事了

translation.en: -[man] All right. -[patient] Oh.
Can we get her some water, please?
Sorry, she can't have any until tomorrow. She still might choke.
translation.zh:
抱歉 她要到明天才能进食
她可能会噎到的 不过呢

translation.en: This is gonna make her feel better.
-I have to go, but I'll be back. -No. No, you can't go.
translation.zh:
-我得先走了 但我会回来的
-不 你不能走

translation.en: [man] You know the rules. I'm not allowed to stay.
translation.zh:
-你知道规矩的
-不要 他们不许我留在这里

translation.en: Hey, Sam, this chair reclines.
translation.zh: 山姆 这椅子可以放平

translation.en: You want a blanket and pillow?
[Sam] Yeah. Thanks. Yeah.
Okay. I won't tell if you don't.
translation.zh: 好的 你不说出去 我也不会说

translation.en: -I'll be right back. -Thanks.
You've pushed a liter. I don't understand why his pressure's low.
translation.zh:
你已经用了那么多药
不知他的血压怎么还这么低

translation.en: They don't know, but they want another set of labs at midnight.
translation.zh:
他们也不知道
但希望半夜再要份检查结果

translation.en: Okay, what about Holly?
Holly is stable, but they still need to get--
translation.zh: 霍莉的情况很稳定 但他们还是得…

translation.en: Amy. I'd like to have a word with you about 310.
translation.zh: 艾米 我得跟你聊聊310病房的病人

translation.en: Jeez.
You let a relative sleep over?
translation.zh: 你竟然允许家属在医院过夜？

translation.en: An old man, yeah. He was exhausted, and it was 1:00 a.m.
translation.zh:
没错 是个老人 他很疲惫
当时都凌晨一点了

translation.en: We don't have the staff to run a hotel for relatives.
translation.zh:
我们可没有足够的人手
来给家属当酒店

translation.en: Management has got me rationing coffee filters.
translation.zh:
管理层甚至让我
缩减咖啡滤纸的用量

translation.en: Every penny is like a freaking prisoner.
I had to beg Linda Garran for extra staff.
translation.zh: 我得求琳达加兰才能另外招人

translation.en: Right.
But I got nights some help, okay?
translation.zh: 但我给夜班找到帮忙的人了

translation.en: A new guy, tons of experience, great recommendations.
translation.zh:
来了个新人 经验丰富
推荐信对他的评价很高

translation.en: -Oh. -[phone rings]
Great.
-You're welcome. -[phone rings]
-It's Viv. -[door closes]
Hey, Holly, it's Amy.
All right, I'm just gonna turn you a little bit. Just put this arm down.
translation.zh:
我来帮你稍微转下方向
把这条手臂放下

translation.en: Hey, I ran into your sister when I started my shift.
translation.zh: 我今天刚上班时遇到你妹妹了

translation.en: She's so nice. Did you guys have a good time together?
translation.zh: 她人真好 你们聚得开心吗？

translation.en: I can't believe she's got twins.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信她有个双胞胎姐姐

translation.en: I don't know how…
she does that.
Okay.
One, two, three. [strains]
How was the fried chicken? Did you do the paper bag shake?
translation.zh: 炸鸡好吃吗？用了摇纸袋那招吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I did the whole thing. Whatever Julia Child said, I did.
translation.zh:
是的 全都照做了
茱莉亚查尔德教的都做了

translation.en: -[Amy] Amazing. -Um…
Uh, I think… you still owe me for last Friday.
translation.zh: 好像你上周五欠我的钱还没给

translation.en: But… But it can wait, really.
Oh no! I'm sorry.
[woman] No, really, it's okay.
I'm such an idiot.
-Okay, 20, 40… -Listen, you really don't have to do this.
-I don't need it all. -Six, seven… No, no, no. Eight, nine…
translation.zh:
-我不需要全部的
-六 七…不行的 八 九…

translation.en: Come on. Here, take it. There's 50. Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 来 拿着吧 这里是50 真不好意思

translation.en: -Thank you. I'm sorry too. -It's yours.
translation.zh:
-谢谢 我也挺不好意思
-本来就是你的钱

translation.en: [girl 1] Come on, Mr. Teddy. We're going to school!
translation.zh: 快点 泰迪先生 我们要去上学了

translation.en: I think we talked about Mr. Teddy not going to school before.
translation.zh:
先前不是说好了
泰迪先生不能去学校的吗？

translation.en: -[girl 2] Thanks, Mom. -Come here, Mr. Bag.
translation.zh:
-谢谢 妈妈
-过来 包包先生

translation.en: [girl 2] I'm ready.
-Bye. -[Amy] Have the best day. -[girl 1] Bye! -[Amy] Love you!
translation.zh:
-再见 妈妈
-再见 祝你今天愉快 我爱你们

translation.en: -You need some milk, by the way. -Okay. I'll get it.
translation.zh:
-顺便说下 你家没牛奶了
-好的 我会去买的

translation.en: -See you later. -Thanks.
[woman] Off to class, girls.
[doctor] So it's not the news we were hoping for.
translation.zh: 检查结果不是很理想啊

translation.en: How bad we talkin'?
If you continue like this,
you're looking at a serious coronary incident within months,
translation.zh:
几个月内
冠状动脉就会出现严重的突发状况

translation.en: which could be fatal.
At the last appointment, you said that there were options.
translation.zh:
上次诊疗时
你提过有不少治疗方案的

translation.en: I know, but that was before we got these results.
translation.zh:
我知道
但当时我们还没拿到这些检查结果

translation.en: This is now about keeping your heart going long enough.
translation.zh:
现在的关键是要尽量拖延时间
让你的心脏能等到那时候

translation.en: For what?
To get you on the transplant list.
translation.zh: 等到能让你进入移植手术名单

translation.en: And you'll have to stop working, take medical leave.
translation.zh: 你必须停止工作 请病假吧

translation.en: I can't. I need health insurance,
translation.zh: 我没办法 我需要医保

translation.en: and I don't get paid leave until I've been there a year.
translation.zh: 只有干满一年 我才能有带薪假期

translation.en: You have kids, right?
Mm-hmm.
Well, you're at high risk for a stroke.
You should make them aware of the symptoms.
translation.zh: 你应该让她们知道你的症状

translation.en: The early warning signs of an episode are breathlessness, pressure in the chest,
translation.zh: 发作的早期迹象包括喘不上气 胸闷

translation.en: feeling weak or faint.
You need to tell them in case something should happen at home. Okay?
translation.zh:
你必须告诉她们
以防在家里出意外 明白吗？

translation.en: -Hi. Loughren. -[receptionist] Mm-hmm.
I'm checking out.
[receptionist] Sure.
-So I see you're not covered? -Nope.
translation.zh:
-你的保险不报这个 对吧？
-对

translation.en: [receptionist] With the test and consultation, it'll be $980.
translation.zh: 检查和咨询费总共是980美元

translation.en: Can I split it in two?
Sure thing.
[woman over speaker] Maria, can you turn me up? Watch TV.
translation.zh:
玛丽亚 你能帮我把床摇起来吗？
我要看电视

translation.en: …vitamin D. Thank you.
-Hey. -Oh.
-You the new guy? -Ah, yeah, Charlie.
translation.zh:
-你就是新来的吗？
-是的  我叫查理

translation.en: Hi, Charlie. Amy.
translation.zh: 你好 查理 我叫艾米

translation.en: -Oh, hey, Amy. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-你好 艾米
-很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Welcome. -Thank you.
-Did anyone give you the tour yet? -Uh, no, not yet.
translation.zh:
-有人带你熟悉环境了吗？
-还没有

translation.en: -I got my patients, but, um… -Okay, come on, let me show you around.
translation.zh: 我刚才在照顾病人 不过… 好吧 那我带你四处转转

translation.en: The computer's free for all.
translation.zh: 电脑不固定 随便用的

translation.en: There's a code to access the bathroom, very importantly,
translation.zh: 进入洗手间需要密码 这点很重要

translation.en: the highly original code 4321.
translation.zh: 这个很有创意的密码是4321

translation.en: Uncrackable.
Uh, you ever work with PYXIS?
translation.zh: 你用过皮克西自动药品柜吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but I think we had the '97 model. The, um…
translation.zh: 用过 但之前用的好像是1997年款

translation.en: Huh, okay, come on. Let me show you.
translation.zh: 好吧 来 我给你演示下

translation.en: Put in your nurse ID.
And then your code.
translation.zh: 然后 输入你的密码

translation.en: You put in what you need.
And the amount.
Take it out. One, two, three, four, five. Close the drawer.
translation.zh: 拿出来 一 二 三 四 五 再关上抽屉

translation.en: -Got it? -Yeah.
Uh, they said you had a lot of experience. Where'd you work at before?
translation.zh:
他们说你经验很丰富
你之前在哪里工作？

translation.en: I've been all over, really.
-Florians, Vance, Shawlands, St. Aloysius. -Shawlands.
translation.zh:
-弗洛里安、凡斯、肖兰、圣阿罗…
-肖兰

translation.en: A girl I trained with works at Shawlands.
translation.zh: 跟我一起培训的女孩就在肖兰工作

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -Lori.
-Lucas? -Yes.
Yeah, we worked together a lot. She's great. She's an amazing nurse.
translation.zh:
我们经常一起共事
她很棒 是个出色的护士

translation.en: I haven't talked to her forever. [chuckles] Do they still call her "Pocket Rocket"?
translation.zh:
我好久没跟她聊过了
他们还叫她“口袋火箭”吗？

translation.en: No. Oh my God. That's hilarious.
translation.zh: 没有 我的天 这绰号太好笑了

translation.en: I should… I'll call her up and ask her about that.
translation.zh: 我要打电话问问她这个

translation.en: Oh God. Please don't. Don't tell her I told you that. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
天呐 拜托不要
别告诉她是我跟你说的

translation.en: Who'd they give you tonight?
translation.zh: 你今晚分配到的病人是谁？

translation.en: Uh… Who did they give me?
I have 311, uh, Stevens. 310, Martinez.
translation.zh: 311号的斯蒂文斯 310号的马丁内斯

translation.en: Do you know their first names? You guys, you don't put 'em on the doors here.
translation.zh:
你知道他们的名吗？
你们这儿不把名写在门上

translation.en: You're like me. First names are always better.
translation.zh:
你跟我一模一样
叫名比叫姓要好多了

translation.en: -Ana. Let's start with her. -Ana.
translation.zh:
-安娜 我们先从她开始
-安娜

translation.en: She presented to the ED with an adverse reaction to amoxicillin.
translation.zh:
她是因为对阿莫西林
有不良反应被送到了急诊科

translation.en: Kicker is the prescription was her husband's,
translation.zh: 但问题是处方在她的丈夫名下

translation.en: so insurance is gonna try to screw them over if we give 'em a chance.
translation.zh:
所以要是我们不帮忙的话
保险公司肯定会让他们吃苦头的

translation.en: -So how's the skin? -Sloughing off at this point.
translation.zh:
-那她皮肤怎么样？
-现在还在脱皮

translation.en: And what, so clears only?
translation.zh: 所以什么意思 只做清洁吗？

translation.en: Yeah. First sip tonight. Come on. I'll introduce you.
translation.zh:
对 今晚第一位病人
来吧 我带你去见她

translation.en: Water later.
Well, hey there, lovebirds.
translation.zh: 嘿 如胶似漆的小情侣

translation.en: -Look what I brought. -Hey.
Here you go.
Is that the best thing you have ever tasted?
translation.zh: 这是不是你尝过最美味的东西？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mm-hmm?
-[Amy] There you go. -[chokes]
[Amy] You know what? Let's start slow, all right?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我们慢慢来 好吗？

translation.en: -I wanna introduce you to Charlie. -Hey.
He's gonna be your nurse this evening, but, you know, I'm around if you need me.
translation.zh:
今晚他是你的护士
如果需要我的话 我就在附近

translation.en: Okay?
-So… -How you doing, Sam? Good? You let me know when you've had enough.
translation.zh:
-山姆 你怎么样？还好吧？
-喝够了就告诉我

translation.en: -Okay, is it burning? It burns? Okay. -I'll check in in a bit.
translation.zh:
-感觉疼吗？疼？好的
-我待会儿再来

translation.en: Well, let's take a pause, okay?
translation.zh: 我们先歇一下 好吗？

translation.en: So, um… tell me, I heard you had a rough couple of days. Yeah?
translation.zh: 听说你这几天很难受 是吗？

translation.en: Well, you guys just push on the button if you need anything.
translation.zh: 有需要的话 就按按钮

translation.en: Anytime, I'm here. I'm your Amy for tonight.
translation.zh: 我随时都在 今晚我就是你的艾米

translation.en: -[knocks twice] -Hey. Hey.
Uh, so mine are all settled, so I was just gonna go to the cafeteria, grab some food.
translation.zh:
我的病人都安顿好了
准备去餐厅吃点东西

translation.en: -You want something? -Sorry. Cafeteria closes at 11:00.
translation.zh:
-你想要些什么吗？
-抱歉 食堂十一点就关门了

translation.en: -I should've told you that. -Oh shit. No problem. I'm not that hungry.
translation.zh:
-我该早点告诉你的
-哎呀 没关系 我也没那么饿

translation.en: -Sorry. -No. I'll hit up the vending machines.
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-不 我去自动贩卖机买点就行了

translation.en: -Hey, you know what? You like eggs? -Uh…
translation.zh: 嘿 你喜欢吃鸡蛋吗？

translation.en: I have a large questionable… [chuckles] …egg salad that I'd prefer to share.
translation.zh:
我有很大一份可能坏了的鸡蛋沙拉
我宁愿跟人分着吃

translation.en: -You know, safety in numbers. -I'm fine, thank you.
translation.zh:
-你懂的 要死一起死嘛
-不用了 谢谢你

translation.en: No, no. I'll bring it to the desk when I'm finished with Holly here.
translation.zh: 不 等我处理完霍莉就带过去找你

translation.en: -You sure? -Yeah.
'Kay, thanks.
I like the croutons.
-Mm, you mean the soggy crackers? -That's what they are?
translation.zh:
-你是说这软趴趴的饼干吗？
-原来是饼干吗？

translation.en: That's the real delicacy of the salad.
Yeah. My eldest daughter made it.
translation.zh: 是啊 我大女儿做的

translation.en: She comes from a long line of women who can't cook.
translation.zh: 我们家不会做饭的女人代代相传

translation.en: What, so your husband cooks?
translation.zh: 怎么 平常是你老公做饭？

translation.en: No, it's just me and my girls.
translation.zh: 不 我们家只有我和我女儿

translation.en: Oh. I have two girls.
Uh… Four and seven.
translation.zh: 一个四岁 一个七岁

translation.en: Mine are five and nine.
translation.zh: 我家一个五岁 一个九岁

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -Mm-hmm.
I don't live with mine anymore though. Their mom moved, like, six hours away, so…
translation.zh:
我没跟孩子住一起了 孩子妈搬走了
过去要六个小时 所以…

translation.en: That's kinda why I'm here.
translation.zh: 这也是我来这里的原因

translation.en: -Well, I think this is great. -[chuckles]
-Okay. -[alert beeping]
Yep. Steven. I have about one minute before he pees.
translation.zh: 史蒂文 他还有一分钟就要尿了

translation.en: I got it.
You sure? Thanks.
Hey, Steven. I'm Charlie. I'm afraid Amy's busy right now, so…
translation.zh:
嘿 史蒂文 我是查理
艾米现在有点忙 所以…

translation.en: Can I help? A little problem?
translation.zh: 我能帮上什么？出了什么问题？

translation.en: [girl] Yes, you can!
-Look. -[woman] So what? You don't even like her.
translation.zh:
-你瞧
-那又怎样？你又不喜欢她

translation.en: -[girl] I do! She's my friend, Jackie! -[Jackie] Nobody's gonna notice that.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢！她是我的朋友 洁姬
-没人会注意到的

translation.en: [girl] Everybody's gonna notice!

translation.zh: 记得 安娜是我的病人

translation.en: Do you recall anything odd about what happened to her?
translation.zh: 你记得她发生过什么奇怪的事吗？

translation.en: Odd?
[Braun] Well, she died.
Yeah, and it was very sad. It was sudden.
translation.zh: 是的 非常让人难受 很突然

translation.en: Sudden?
Well, patients die in the ICU, but…
translation.zh: 病人是在重症监护室去世的 但…

translation.en: we didn't expect it.
I don't mean to interrupt. Can I see you for a minute?
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰 我能和你谈谈吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我马上回来

translation.en: This better be important. I wanted no interruptions.
translation.zh: 最好是重要的事 我现在不想被打扰

translation.en: You see any deviations there?
translation.zh: 你觉得有什么不对劲吗？

translation.en: Mm-mm.
Wait, yeah. Her glucose.
translation.zh: 等等 对了 她的血糖

translation.en: It's, uh…
Yeah, the blood sugars, it's wrong.
Uh, there's no C-peps.
-That's weird. -What does that mean?
Uh, it means that the insulin in her system wasn't made in her body.
translation.zh:
这说明她体内的胰岛素
并不是在她体内合成的

translation.en: Someone gave it to her.
So you can tell from that that she was given insulin?
translation.zh:
从这点你就能判断
有人给她注射了胰岛素？

translation.en: Well, it's not on the list, and, you know, she's, uh… not diabetic,
translation.zh:
这个嘛 药单上没有
而且她没有糖尿病

translation.en: so the insulin would've been a double medication error,
translation.zh: 所以胰岛素可能是双重用药差错

translation.en: which is really rare, so…
A double medication error? It's rare?
translation.zh: 双重用药差错？很少见吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
-Would that have killed her? -Sure.
[Garran] Sorry.
-[door closes] -[Garran] Where were we?
Uh, let's see. Oh.
Can you tell us anything about your coworkers?
translation.zh: 可以跟我们聊聊你的同事吗？

translation.en: You don't mind if she answers a question about a colleague, do you, Ms. Garran?
translation.zh:
你不介意
她回答和同事相关的问题吧？

translation.en: -Of course not. -[Braun] Good
[Baldwin] We understand that you work with a Charlie Cullen.
translation.zh: 我们知道你和查理卡伦一起工作

translation.en: -[Amy] Yeah. -Could he be involved in this?
I think you're jumping to conclusions there, Officer.
translation.zh: 我觉得你的结论太草率了 警官

translation.en: Charlie wasn't there.
I mean, Ana died on the day shift. Charlie and I both work nights.
translation.zh:
安娜是白班去世的
查理和我都上夜班

translation.en: We have no reasons to suspect it was anything other than an accident.
translation.zh:
我们没有怀疑的理由
这只不过是一场意外

translation.en: Thank you, Amy.
I know Charlie really well.
We work every shift together, and he's a very good nurse.
translation.zh:
我们每次都一起轮班
他是个很优秀的护士

translation.en: He wouldn't have made a mistake like that. Thank you, Amy.
translation.zh:
-他是不会犯这种错的
-谢谢你 艾米

translation.en: -So where's that internal investigation? -We're still reviewing everything.
translation.zh:
-对了 内部调查报告在哪里？
-我们还在核对所有的信息

translation.en: Well, we don't need you to review it. We'll just take it as it is.
translation.zh: 你们不用核对了 就这样给我们吧

translation.en: I'll instruct the team to send you the boxes tomorrow.
translation.zh: 那我通知团队明天把箱子寄给你们

translation.en: But I hope you can deduce that, um… it's been a tough seven weeks.
translation.zh:
但我希望你们推断出来
这七周过得非常不容易

translation.en: Eight.
It's been eight weeks.
-[frantic beeping] -[doctor 1] Jack Ivins. July 19, '88.
translation.zh: 杰克艾文斯 1988年7月19日出生

translation.en: Recovering from gallbladder surgery on Thursday. There was no complications.
translation.zh: 周四做完胆囊手术 没有出现并发症

translation.en: [woman] Line in.
[doctor 2] Gonna need you to get ready to do another shock, 150 joules.
-Everybody clear. -[doctor 3] Clear.
translation.zh:
-大家都准备好了
-你 我都准备好了

translation.en: [doctor 2] Deliver the shock. Shock.
translation.zh:
-氧气也没问题
-传送电击 电击

translation.en: Resume compressions.
[doctor 4] One and two and three and four and five and six…
-[doctor 2] Compressions. -Nine, ten, 11, 12, 13…
[doctor 2] Hold compressions. Let's check for a rhythm.
translation.zh: 停止按压 看看心跳的情况

translation.en: -[doctor 3] I got nothing. -[doctor 2] Persistent V-fib. Resume compressions.
translation.zh:
-我这边什么都没有
-坚持除颤 继续按压

translation.en: Let's get one milligram of epinephrine IV started.
translation.zh: 先注射一毫克肾上腺素

translation.en: [doctor 3] Six, seven, eight, nine, ten…
[doctor 2] Let's get prepared to give it another shock, 200 joules.
[doctor 1] Epi ready. In line.
[doctor 2] Continue your breathing.
-[doctor 3] Twenty. -[doctor 1] Keep your compressions.
[doctor 3] Talk to me.
-[doctor 2] Is that epi ready? -[Amy groans]
Swap in, five, four, three, two…
-[gasping for breath] -[doctor 3] You're all clear.
-Oxygen's clear. -[defibrillation thumps]
[doctor 1] I'm moving in. Low pulse, low pulse.
translation.zh: 我进来了 脉搏微弱

translation.en: -Shit, no pressure, still. -[continuous beep droning]
[doctor 2] Four and five and six and seven
and eight and nine, ten, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15.
Shit.
Twenty-five. Now! Now!
[doctor 2, muffled] Let's go!
Take these.
[softly] You'll get fired.
So there's a fault in the PYXIS.
translation.zh: 皮克西自动药品柜有个故障

translation.en: So if you cancel a request late enough, it opens anyway.
translation.zh: 如果你晚点取消 抽屉还是会开的

translation.en: That's stealing meds, Charlie.
Amy, stop. Now, please don't worry. I'm gonna help you get through this.
translation.zh:
艾米 别这样 不要担心
我会帮你渡过难关的

translation.en: Hey, what did he say?
[Charlie] I think he's right. I think you probably do need to tell Alex,
translation.zh: 我赞同他的想法 我觉得你应该告诉告诉亚历克斯

translation.en: just in case something happens and I'm not there.
translation.zh: 以防我不在的时候有什么事情

translation.en: They don't have anyone but me. I can't leave them.
translation.zh:
她们现在除了我谁都没有了
我不能丢下她们

translation.en: No, you're not leaving them, Amy.
translation.zh: 不 你不会丢下她们的 艾米

translation.en: That's not happening. It's… What is it? Two months?
translation.zh:
不会发生这种事情的
还要多久？两个月？

translation.en: Okay, so I'm gonna help you do this.
translation.zh:
我会帮你的 你会顺利做完手术
继续跟你女儿们在一起

translation.en: Get your surgery, be with your girls. That's what's happening.
translation.zh:
我会帮你的 你会顺利做完手术
继续跟你女儿们在一起 一定会这样的

translation.en: Okay?
But I think you should tell Alex.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你应该告诉亚历克斯

translation.en: [Amy] I know it sounds scary, but… it really isn't.
translation.zh: 我知道这听着很吓人 但其实不是

translation.en: [Charlie] Everybody's hearts have these ventricles.
translation.zh: 每个人的心脏都有心室

translation.en: -They're just these spaces. -Yeah.
They're two little spaces like balloons that fill with blood.
translation.zh:
是两个气球一样的小空隙
里面充满了血液

translation.en: -They move the blood around the body. -Mm-hmm.
And um… mine, they just, you know,
they're too big, and they just got a little thin.
translation.zh: 太大了 而且还有点薄

translation.en: But I am gonna be okay. I've got medication.
translation.zh: 但我不会有事的 我有吃药

translation.en: I have doctors taking care of me, and I'm gonna feel normal soon.
translation.zh: 有医生在照顾我 很快就会恢复正常

translation.en: But your mom's gonna need our help, Alex.
translation.zh: 但你妈妈需要我们帮忙 亚历克斯

translation.en: If she were to fall or, um, you know, start speaking funny,
translation.zh: 如果她跌倒了 或者说话很奇怪

translation.en: or you struggle to wake her or something,
translation.zh: 或者很难把她叫醒 或者其他情况

translation.en: then you just… you put Maya in front of the TV, you call 911, and then you call me.
translation.zh:
你就你把玛雅放在电视前面
接着打911 然后给我打电话

translation.en: Yeah, but that's not gonna happen. It's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 但是不会出现这种情况 不会出现的

translation.en: [softly] Everything's gonna be fine. I'm gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的 我不会有事的

translation.en: Can I just go watch some TV?
Okay.
But I'll be here if you wanna…
translation.zh: 我就在这里 如果你想…

translation.en: [Braun] Charles Cullen with a C.
C-U-L-L-E-N.
[man 1] Sure. Give me a second while I pull up his records.
translation.zh: 好的 请稍等 正在找他的记录

translation.en: Great, thanks.
[man 1] Okay, I just need to check something with my boss.
translation.zh: 好的 我先和我老板确认一下

translation.en: Okay. Sure.
[man 2] Hello?
Hello. Detective Braun here. Uh, who am I talking to?
translation.zh: 喂 我是布劳恩警探 请问您是？

translation.en: Mark Rossi. Attorney for St. Aloysius Hospital Group.
translation.zh:
马克罗西
圣阿洛伊修斯医院集团的律师

translation.en: Mr. Rossi, hi. I'm hoping you can help me out.
translation.zh: 罗西先生 你好 我希望你可以帮帮忙

translation.en: I'm looking for some information on one of your former employees
translation.zh: 我正在你们之前一位员工的信息

translation.en: from back in '96, Charles Cullen.
translation.zh: 查尔斯卡伦 是在1996年

translation.en: Our employee data is treated with strict confidentiality.
translation.zh: 我们的员工资料都是严格保密的

translation.en: I'm just looking to confirm his dates of employment, not much more than that.
translation.zh: 我只是想确认一下他的工作日期而已

translation.en: We'd be happy to release any relevant information
as soon as we see your subpoena.
translation.zh: 我们会很乐意公布相关信息

translation.en: Okay, yep, thank you so much.
Thank you.
This is a fucking joke.
Whenever they hear his name, no one wants to say anything.
translation.zh:
每次提到他的名字
没人透露任何信息

translation.en: Detective Baldwin?
-Yeah. -It's from Parkfield Memorial Hospital.
translation.zh:
-对
-帕克菲尔德纪念医院寄来的

translation.en: [Baldwin] It's the internal investigation.
-Just need you to sign here. -All right.
translation.zh:
-你只用在这里签字就好
-好吧

translation.en: -Need a hand with the boxes? -No, it's just this.
translation.zh:
-需要帮忙搬箱子吗？
-不用 就这么点东西

translation.en: [delivery man] Have a great day.
-Ms. Garran. -Detective Baldwin.
Oh, thank you for seeing me.
Anything to help wrap this up.
translation.zh: 只要有助于把调查结束掉就行

translation.en: So, I just have a couple of questions.
translation.zh: 是这样的 我有几个问题

translation.en: The "Pixie" report. You have all the drug withdrawals--
translation.zh:
皮克斯报告里面
有所有的药物取用记录

translation.en: Uh, PYXIS.
That's right.
Uh, so you've got all of the, um, drug withdrawals for all of the nurses on this?
translation.zh: 这上面有所有护士的药物取用记录

translation.en: That's correct.
Well, I was hoping I could get the full report,
translation.zh: 我希望我能拿到完整的报告

translation.en: because this one only has a short window around Ana's expiration.
translation.zh:
因为这这上面只有
安娜去世前很短一段时间内的

translation.en: I'm told it only stores the information for four weeks.
translation.zh:
据我所知
它只能存储最近四个星期的信息

translation.en: Well, you must have gotten a copy during the internal investigation, right?
translation.zh:
那你们在进行内部调查时
应该拿到了一份记录 对吧？

translation.en: I don't believe we did, no.
I mean, I can check, but, uh… everything we had was sent to you.
translation.zh:
我倒是可以去查一下
但是我们有的资料都寄给你们了

translation.en: You see, this is page nine,
so pages one to eight gotta be around here somewhere.
translation.zh:
所以第一页到第八页
应该还放在某个地方吧

translation.en: -Uh, I'll be sure to look into it. -[clicks pen]
Nurse Garran, it's looking a lot like you're withholding some evidence here.
translation.zh:
加兰护士
你的行为很像是在隐瞒证据啊

translation.en: -I'm not sure I follow-- -Six pages. Where's the rest of it?
translation.zh:
-我不太明白…
-就只有六页 其他的在哪里？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I… I have another meeting, and I can't shift it--
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我还有一个会 推不掉…

translation.en: Oh, I'm not done.
I'm gonna reschedule with your office.
translation.zh: 我会和你办公室重新安排时间的

translation.en: Sit down.
-Excuse me-- -Sit the fuck down!
You know exactly what you're doing.
translation.zh: 你很清楚自己在做什么

translation.en: -[Amy] Hey, guys. -[woman] Hey.
Um, I know you're not supposed to have babies in here,
translation.zh: 我知道不该把婴儿带到这里

translation.en: but I really didn't have anyone else who could take her.
translation.zh: 但我实在找不到人照顾她

translation.en: -It's okay. -[man] Thank you.
-[Amy] What's her name? -Vanessa.
Messy Nessie.
-Messy Nessie? -[woman] Uh-huh.
Well, I have two girls, so I hear that.
translation.zh: 我有两个女儿 我明白的

translation.en: -Mm. -[Amy] How old is she?
Six months.
Oh. She sleeping through the night yet?
translation.zh: 噢 她晚上能睡整觉了吗？

translation.en: -[laughs] No! -[Amy] She must be teething.
-[woman] Oh, yeah. -[Amy] Uh-huh.
Nurse Loughren? It's not urgent. There's a Code Purple in 300.
translation.zh: 洛克伦护士？ 不是紧急情况 300房紫色代码了

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, okay.
What's a Code Purple?
It means pizza's arrived. Do you want a slice?
translation.zh: 意思是披萨到了 你想来一块吗？

translation.en: Oh.
Well, I can't say no to pizza.
translation.zh: 我怎么拒绝得了披萨呢

translation.en: You can't.
Unfortunately, though, you're gonna have to say no to pizza.
translation.zh: 可惜的是 你吃不了披萨

translation.en: Okay.
But you are healing nicely, and will be holding Vanessa in no time.
translation.zh:
但你恢复得很好
很快就能抱凡妮莎了

translation.en: She told me to go fuck myself 15 times on the phone.
translation.zh: 她在电话里对我说了十五次让我去死

translation.en: Oh my God.
That's not nice.
I haven't even told you the best part.
translation.zh: 我还没跟你讲最精彩的部分呢

translation.en: So now, to try and stop me from seeing the girls,
she has made up a story about me being mean to her dog.
translation.zh: 还编了个故事 说我欺负她的狗

translation.en: I'm not kidding. It gets better and better.
translation.zh: 我不是在开玩笑吗？越来越精彩了

translation.en: Honestly, the whole thing would be hilarious if it wasn't true.
translation.zh:
老实说 如果这不是真事的话
我也会觉得非常搞笑的

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Charlie] No. Are you kidding? It's my own fault.
translation.zh: 不 你在开玩笑吗？是我自己的错

translation.en: I picked a crazy.
[Jackie] Two minutes, girls.
translation.zh: 再过两分钟 姑娘们

translation.en: Okay. Do you wanna get your backpack and coat?
translation.zh: 你要不要去拿书包和外套？

translation.en: -You want a ponytail for school? -[Alex] Sure.
Beautiful hair.
I wish we could stay home.
translation.zh: 真希望我们可以待在家里

translation.en: I wish that too.
-Wanna get your jacket? -Yeah. -Love you. -Love you.
translation.zh:
-你要拿外套吗？爱你
-好的 爱你

translation.en: [Braun] What else is in that? Anything new?
translation.zh: 里面还有什么？有什么新信息吗？

translation.en: Yeah, there was a list of all the medications
translation.zh: 是的 有一份安娜马丁内斯体内

translation.en: that were in Ana Martinez's system.
-Insulin? -Yeah, and another one.
Get this. Digoxin.
-Digoxin? -[door opens]
[man] Baldwin!
-Are you serious? -Shit.
Screaming at her. Malcolm Burrel from City Council just called.
translation.zh:
你吼她了？市议会的马尔科姆伯雷尔
刚打电话过来了

translation.en: Danny will be happy to apologize to Mrs. Garran.
translation.zh: 丹尼很愿意向加兰夫人道歉

translation.en: Well, too late. You've both been banned from the hospital property.
translation.zh: 太晚了 你俩都不准进入医院了

translation.en: What?
Can't ban us from the scene of a crime that we're investigating.
translation.zh:
总不能禁止我们去
我们正在调查的犯罪现场啊

translation.en: -[man] What crime? -[Baldwin] Homicide.
What do you have to back this up?
The files and an interview with a nurse
translation.zh: 这些档案 还有询问过一名护士

translation.en: who was certain that the victim was given insulin.
translation.zh: 她确定受害者被注射了胰岛素

translation.en: Victim, what victim?
Ana Martinez.
You have no body.
No body, no autopsy. You know how this works.
translation.zh: 没尸体就没法验尸 你知道规矩的

translation.en: Banned from the fuckin' hospital?
translation.zh: 不准我们进他妈的医院？

translation.en: [Amy] Hey, Kelly. Tom called to check on you.
translation.zh: 凯莉 汤姆打电话来问你了

translation.en: I cannot get over how cute that little Vanessa is.
translation.zh: 我根本忘不掉小凡妮莎有多可爱

translation.en: Who's Vanessa?
Kelly, do you know where you are right now?
translation.zh: 凯莉 你知道你现在在哪里吗？

translation.en: I need you to answer me, hon.
translation.zh: 我需要你回答我 亲

translation.en: I'm at the hospital.
Which hospital?
All right.
Squeeze my hands.
Come on. Squeeze my hands.
A little light.
Has Tom come by?
He called to check on you.
-Hey, Tom, it's Amy from the hospital. -Hi, Amy. What's going on?
translation.zh:
-嘿 汤姆 我是医院的艾米
-嗨 艾米 你好吗？

translation.en: I really think that you should come in. There's been a change overnight.
translation.zh:
我觉得你很有必要过来一下
情况一夜之间发生了变化

translation.en: I think you should come in sooner rather than later.
translation.zh: 我觉得应该尽可能早点赶过来

translation.en: Okay, see you soon.
I checked in with Beth. She's still sleeping.
translation.zh: 我去看过贝丝了 她还在睡觉

translation.en: -Jack's been pushing on his call button-- -Oh my God.
translation.zh:
-杰克一直在按呼叫铃…
-我的天啊

translation.en: What?
There's insulin in her system.
[PA] Code Blue. Wing West.
Code Blue. Wing West.
Code Blue. Wing West.
Oh my God! Oh God!
-No! -[Vanessa groans]
[Tom] Oh God!
Oh my God!
-[Amy, softly] It's okay. -[Vanessa coos]
Shit.
Hello. Sorry to bother you like this.
translation.zh: 你好 很抱歉这样来打扰你

translation.en: Yeah, no.
We need your help, Amy.
translation.zh: 我们需要你帮忙 艾米

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, guys. I… Really, I don't know what happened to her.
translation.zh: 抱歉 两位 我不知道她怎么了

translation.en: To who?
Kelly Anderson. I… I mean…
translation.zh: 凯莉安德森 我说的是…

translation.en: Who's Kelly Anderson?
[Baldwin] Is there another victim?
Another double-medication error?
Was Cullen with Kelly Anderson?
translation.zh: 卡伦有跟凯莉安德森在一起过吗？

translation.en: This has nothing to do with Charlie.
-How well do you know him? -Really well.
[Baldwin] Do you?
He's been at nine hospitals.
And none of 'em will talk to us.
translation.zh: 没有一家医院愿意回应我们

translation.en: What do you mean? I'm…
No. If something had happened, he wouldn't have been able to get a job.
translation.zh:
如果有什么问题的话
他就不可能再找到工作了

translation.en: -The hospital would have done something. -You'd think so.
translation.zh:
-医院肯定会做些什么
-事情理应如此

translation.en: Yeah.
They're stonewalling us.
You have to help us.
Mom, are you coming?
Hey, honey. Yeah, I'll be in in a second. Just wait inside, okay?
translation.zh:
嘿 宝贝 我马上就来
你在里面等着 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
[softly] Guys, I can't talk right now. My kid's here. Like…
translation.zh:
两位 我现在没法聊
我的孩子在这里 我…

translation.en: Okay. Here's my card.
translation.zh: 好的 这是我的名片

translation.en: Give me a call. Maybe he's not who you think.
translation.zh: 打电话给我 也许他和你想的不一样

translation.en: Have a nice day.
[Braun] Thanks.
[Charlie] Hey.
[Amy] Hey.
-Do you need anything? -Mm-mm.
-No? -I'm fine.
Okay. You let me know if you feel tired.
translation.zh: 好的 如果觉得累就告诉我

translation.en: I'm not. I will. I feel good.
translation.zh: 不累 会告诉你的 我感觉很好

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
-Okay. -Mm.
[woman] Amy fucking Loughren!
-[Amy] Pocket Rocket! -Mm!
-[Lori] It is so good to see you! -[Amy] I know. You look so good.
translation.zh: 见到你真好 是啊 你气色真好

translation.en: -Really? -Yes! You look great.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-是啊 气色非常好

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
-I feel exhausted. -[server] Hi there! You ready to order?
translation.zh:
-我都筋疲力尽了
-你好 可以点餐了吗？

translation.en: -Oh, I'll have a cheese omelet. -Okay.
-And what pairs best with that? -Chardonnay.
translation.zh:
-搭配什么最合适呢？
-霞多丽葡萄酒

translation.en: Oh. A large cold glass of dry chardonnay.
translation.zh: 一大杯冰镇霞多丽干白

translation.en: -Okay. -I'll have the same. -Thanks. -Coming right up.
translation.zh:
-我也一样 谢谢
-好 马上来

translation.en: When was the last time we were in this dive?
translation.zh: 我们上次来这里是什么时候？

translation.en: A long time ago. Like, at least a decade.
translation.zh: 很久以前 至少有十年了

translation.en: -What? -Twelve years?
-Ugh, Jesus. -[Amy chuckles]
-I'm getting old. -[server] Here we go.
Thank you.
How's Paul?
Uh, we split up.
-Oh shit. -I mean, it's not a big deal.
It was a long time ago, and we share custody of the dogs.
translation.zh:
那是很久之前的事了
我们现在一起养狗

translation.en: We worked hard to come to that agreement. I'm so glad that you called.
translation.zh:
好不容易才达成了协议
我很开心你打电话来了

translation.en: Mm! Me too. [chuckles]
Just, you know, I wanted to… I wanted to ask you… It's… It's a little weird.
translation.zh: 只不过 我想问你点事 有些奇怪

translation.en: I love weird.
But, um… do you remember working with someone named Charlie Cullen?
translation.zh:
你记不记得和一个
叫查理卡伦的人工作过？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
Why?
Well, I'm working with him right now at Parkfield.
translation.zh: 我现在在帕克菲尔德和他一起工作

translation.en: There was a rumor about him.
That he was responsible for a death.
translation.zh: 有一起死亡是他的责任

translation.en: That he OD'd someone.
translation.zh: 他导致了某人用药过量

translation.en: Oh.
Uh, with what?
They found insulin in the dead guy's saline bag.
translation.zh:
他们在死者的生理盐水袋里
发现了胰岛素

translation.en: They found it in a few.
Pinpricks in the ones in the store.
translation.zh: 储藏室中盐水袋上有针孔

translation.en: Somebody had dosed them before they went out.
translation.zh:
有人在盐水袋还没拿出去前
就往里面加了东西

translation.en: Why did they think it was Charlie?
translation.zh: 他们为什么会怀疑是查理干的？

translation.en: They didn't.
But we used to get codes every night. Sometimes two or three.
translation.zh:
以前我们每晚总会遇到紧急情况
有时候两到三次

translation.en: And then after he left,
we got, like, only one a month.
translation.zh: 我们一个月就只有一次了

translation.en: You get a lot of codes?
translation.zh: 你们也有很多紧急情况吗？

translation.en: Oh God.
[woman] Oh!
[Charlie] Hey.
Easy, easy.
You're okay. You're okay. It's okay.
-Amy, it's okay. -[beeping speeds up]
You're in the ED. You're doing great.
translation.zh: 你在急救科里 你现在情况很稳定

translation.en: I checked on the girls. Jackie's with them.
translation.zh:
我去看过女儿们了
洁姬和她们在一起

translation.en: I can go get 'em, bring 'em here.
- [shudders] No. -No? Okay.
You want some water?
No?
Don't you ever scare me like that again please.
-[wheezily] I wanna leave. -[Charlie] I know, I know.
I get it.
We're not gonna let them find out.
translation.zh: 我们不会让他们知道的

translation.en: Where… Where's the nurse?
Uh, don't worry. Your last pressure looked pretty good.
translation.zh: 别担心 最近一次血压测量结果很好

translation.en: Your heart rate's been below 80 for the last hour.
translation.zh: 你的心率最近一小时都在80以下

translation.en: I saw the labs, and your troponin's high, but it's trending down.
translation.zh:
我看了检查结果 肌钙蛋白偏高
但是有下降的趋势

translation.en: So you're good. You're okay.
translation.zh: 所以你的情况很好 不会有事的

translation.en: You're lucky. Could've been a lot worse.
translation.zh: 已经运气很好了 有可能会非常糟

translation.en: -I wanna go home. -I know.
-Okay. -[woman] Hey. Saw her heart rate blip up.
translation.zh:
-好
-喂 看到她的心率上升了

translation.en: -You awake? -[Charlie] Yeah--
Bring me a discharge form.
translation.zh:
-是的…
-把出院表给我拿来 嘿 我觉得这不是个好主意
她应该再多住一晚

translation.en: Hey. I don't think that's a good idea. She should stay overnight.
translation.zh:
嘿 我觉得这不是个好主意
她应该再多住一晚

translation.en: -Yeah, we got this. -I wanna leave AMA.
translation.zh:
-嗯 我们没问题的
-我想违背医嘱出院

translation.en: -You sure? -[beeping rapidly]
I'll drive her home. Make sure she's looked after. Thank you.
translation.zh:
我会开车送她回去
确保她有人照顾 谢谢

translation.en: -[long beep droning] -[Charlie] We're good. Thank you.
Hey.
-[Amy groans] -Please, stop.
[sniffs] Okay.
Give me your arm.
So you sure you don't want me to come in?
I'm happy to sleep on the couch. I can…
translation.zh: 我很高兴睡在沙发上 我可以…

translation.en: -I can take the girls to school. -I don't wanna scare them.
translation.zh:
-我可以送女儿们去学校
-我不想吓到她们

translation.en: Nothing's gonna happen. I just… I just need to sleep.
translation.zh: 不会有事的 我只是需要睡觉

translation.en: -[parking brake clicks] -You're right.
-Thanks, Charlie. -Yeah.
But if you need anything…
translation.zh: 但如果你需要什么的话…

translation.en: I'll call you.
Yeah?
It's a month, Amy.
translation.zh: 只剩一个月了 艾米

translation.en: We got this.
You're freezing. Go.
translation.zh: 你身上好冰 快去吧

translation.en: Call me.
It has to be a secret.
[softly] Oh God.
No one can know.
I'll get fired.
Understood.
He does it in the storage room…
before it even goes out.
He injects the insulin into the bags,
translation.zh: 他就往里面注射了胰岛素

translation.en: and because it enters the bloodstream slowly,
translation.zh: 因为这样胰岛素会缓慢地进入血液

translation.en: it could take hours or even, you know, a day to kill someone.
translation.zh: 所以需要几个小时甚至一天才会致死

translation.en: So he's killing 'em without ever touching 'em.
translation.zh: 他不用接触就能把人给杀了

translation.en: Could he put something other than insulin inside those bags?
translation.zh:
除了胰岛素之外
他可能在盐水袋里放别的东西吗？

translation.en: Yeah, any clear liquid wouldn't be detected.
translation.zh: 是的 任何透明液体都不会被察觉

translation.en: Is digoxin a clear liquid?
Yeah.
[Braun] Could it kill someone?
Okay, and the nurse you met with, you think she'll talk to us?
translation.zh:
你见了的那个护士
她会愿意见我们吗？

translation.en: No.
No, she'll lose her job.
translation.zh: 不 会让她丢掉工作的

translation.en: [Baldwin] Do you mind taking a look at what we got here from Parkfield?
translation.zh:
你介意看下我们
从帕克菲尔德拿到的资料吗？

translation.en: Where's the rest of it?
That's it. That's all we have. That's all they gave us.
translation.zh:
就这些 我们只有这些
他们给我们的都在这里了

translation.en: The PYXIS report's just two pages.
translation.zh: 皮克西的报告就只有两页

translation.en: They said it only keeps the file for four weeks.
translation.zh: 他们说药品柜只能保存四星期的记录

translation.en: No, it's a computer.
It keeps the information for as long as it was installed. It's…
translation.zh: 安装之后的信息都会一直保存 是…

translation.en: I'll pull Charlie's PYXIS report from the machine in my ward,
translation.zh:
我会把查理的皮克西报告
从我病房的机器里调出来

translation.en: and we'll use that to prove that he withdrew insulin
translation.zh: 我们就用那个来证明安娜去世的时候

translation.en: and digoxin when Ana died.
translation.zh: 他取用了胰岛素和地高辛

translation.en: Yeah, see, the problem is that Ana Martinez was cremated,
translation.zh: 好的 问题是安娜马丁内斯被火化了

translation.en: so we don't have an autopsy.
What we need is an actual body.
translation.zh: 我们需要实实在在的遗体

translation.en: [Baldwin] As you know, we got permission from Kelly Anderson's husband
translation.zh:
如你所知 我们得到了
凯莉安德森丈夫的许可

translation.en: to dig up her body for examination.
translation.zh: 去把她的遗体挖出来检验

translation.en: From the autopsy, we know that a combination of insulin and digoxin
translation.zh:
根据尸检结果我们发现她的体内
有胰岛素和地高辛的混合物

translation.en: were in Kelly's system and led to her death in the early hours of the 15th.
[Amy] Right, and then on the 14th at 20:47,
translation.zh: 对了 然后是14号 22点47分的时候

translation.en: you see that Charlie took out insulin and digoxin from the PYXIS.
translation.zh:
你可以看到查理从皮克西药品柜中
取用了胰岛素和地高辛

translation.en: And if you see Kelly's report,
translation.zh: 如果你再看凯莉的报告

translation.en: her blood sugar just drops at 21:56,
so that is the insulin taking effect.
translation.zh: 所以这就是胰岛素起作用了

translation.en: And there's slow arrhythmia at 22:15,
and that's digoxin.
So he was holding two murder weapons. 3:57 is the time of death.
translation.zh:
所以他掌握着两种凶器
死亡时间是3点57分

translation.en: Everything's there.
Wait a second. Hold on.
With this PYXIS, it says cancellations, not withdrawals.
translation.zh:
这个皮克西报告上说取消了
没有取出

translation.en: Well, it's a fault in the system.
So when you cancel at the last minute, the drawer opens,
translation.zh:
如果最后按取消的话
抽屉还是会打开的

translation.en: but it reports it as a cancellation.
And Cullen knows about that?
Yeah, and I saw him do it.
translation.zh: 是的 我看他这么做过

translation.en: Insulin, digoxin. There's hundreds of orders here.
translation.zh: 胰岛素 地高辛 这里有几百条记录

translation.en: Okay, but not according to this. This makes it look like he never got 'em.
translation.zh:
好吧 但这上面不是这样写的
从这上面看 他从来没取用过

translation.en: But he did.
Did you actually see him do this?
translation.zh: 你亲眼见他这么做过吗？

translation.en: Guys, this is the smoking gun right here.
translation.zh: 各位 这是证据确凿啊

translation.en: Yeah, but this isn't.
It's just cancellations. There's nothing nefarious.
translation.zh: 只是取消记录 看不出有什么预谋

translation.en: There's no proof of guilt. There's--
Okay, he's been doing this since he started at Parkfield, so look.
translation.zh: 他一到帕克菲尔德 就开始这样做了 你看 全是反复取消的记录 对吧？

translation.en: Look at all of these repeated cancellations, right?
translation.zh: 你看 全是反复取消的记录 对吧？

translation.en: Look. They're not followed up with a correct order.
translation.zh:
看 在取消之后
也从没接上正确的药单

translation.en: He's had repeated orders of vec and digoxin.
translation.zh: 他只是在反复取用维库溴铵和地高辛

translation.en: I mean, it's really-- It just screams wrong. It's…
translation.zh: 说真的 这很明显有问题 这…

translation.en: Maybe. Maybe Parkfield just didn't understand.
translation.zh:
也许吧
也许只是帕克菲尔德院方不懂呢

translation.en: Come on, guys. Linda Garran used to be a nurse.
translation.zh:
不可能的 各位
琳达加兰以前也是护士

translation.en: She understood.
Oh yeah, she knows, and she's not doing anything.
translation.zh: 肯定的 她知道 可她什么都没做

translation.en: [Garran] Nurse Cullen, thank you for coming in on your day off.
translation.zh: 卡伦护士 感谢你在休息时赶过来

translation.en: Hi, you can call me Charlie.
translation.zh: 嗨 你叫我查理就行

translation.en: Uh… We've come across something troubling.
translation.zh: 我们发现了一些令人担忧的事

translation.en: What hospital were you employed at before you took the position here?
translation.zh: 你在这里工作之前在哪个医院任职？

translation.en: St. Elizabeth's.
And what were your dates of employment there?
translation.zh: 你在那里工作的具体日期是？

translation.en: I'm not sure. Is there an issue from St. Elizabeth's?
translation.zh:
我不太确定
是圣伊丽莎白出了什么问题吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I was targeted by some coworkers. I don't know. Maybe they're at it again.
translation.zh:
因为我当时被一些同事盯上了
我不知道 是不是他们又来…

translation.en: What we're concerned with are the dates you listed on your application.
translation.zh: 我们关心的是你在申请表上填的日期

translation.en: Do you remember what they were?
June '01 to August '03, maybe.
translation.zh: 六月一号到八月三号 好像是

translation.en: -Yes, that's what you wrote. -Right.
Those dates are incorrect, Mr. Cullen.
translation.zh: 这些日期不对 卡伦先生

translation.en: Oh.
St. Elizabeth's confirmed with us that you were employed from May,
translation.zh:
圣伊丽莎白跟我们确认了
你是五月入职的

translation.en: so these discrepancies on your application form
translation.zh: 所以你申请表上的出入

translation.en: leave us with no option but to let you go
translation.zh: 让我们别无选择 只能让你…

translation.en: with immediate effect.
Wait, so you're firing me for writing the wrong dates on my application?
translation.zh:
等等 就因为申请表上填错了个日期
你们就要把我开除？

translation.en: It… It is in the contract.
Well, I believe I need to sign something.
translation.zh: 我是不是还要签个字什么的？

translation.en: Is that all?
That's all.
Thank you, Mr. Cullen.
I just got news from Parkfield. They've dealt with the Cullen issue.
translation.zh:
我刚收到帕克菲尔德的消息
他们把卡伦的问题处理好了

translation.en: -What does that mean? -He's been fired.
-What? -So they're just gonna let him go?
Well, what did they say?
That they fired him because they found some discrepancy in his paperwork.
translation.zh:
他们把他开除了
因为在他的文档里发现了一些出入

translation.en: Well, what was his state of mind? Was he stable?
translation.zh: 那他当时的状态如何？稳定吗？

translation.en: Wait, you don't think that this could make him more dangerous, do you?
translation.zh:
等等 你们不会觉得
这样会让他变得更危险吧？

translation.en: At least he can't be anywhere near patients.
translation.zh: 至少他不能再接近病人了

translation.en: He can't hurt anyone.
He's been at nine hospitals. Nine.
translation.zh: 他在九家医院都待过 九家

translation.en: What don't you understand?
They all say the same thing. They cover up their own liabilities.
translation.zh:
他们都说了同样的话
掩盖自己的责任

translation.en: It happens again and again and again.
translation.zh: 这种事一次又一次地出现

translation.en: He's gonna get a new job at another hospital, and it's all gonna continue.
translation.zh:
他会在另一家医院找到新工作
一切会照旧

translation.en: You allowed this.
Don't look at me. You did.
-Jackie, I'm back. -[Alex] Maya.
-[Maya] Oh my God! -[Alex] Maya! Can you just say your line?
translation.zh:
-我的天！
-玛雅！你不能好好说你的台词吗？

translation.en: Hey, girls.
[Maya] I forgot it.
Wow.
What?
[Maya] Don't you have the script?
-[Alex] I don't have the script. -Oh my God.
[Maya] Okay, I lost it.
[Alex] Maya, you've done this so many times!
translation.zh: 玛雅 你这都是第几次了

translation.en: Okay, Alex, be nice to your sister.
translation.zh: 亚历克斯 对你妹妹好点

translation.en: [Alex] Maya's speaking over Charlie's part again.
What are you doing here?
Rehearsing.
Where's Jackie?
I told her she could go home. It was just gonna be us tonight.
translation.zh:
我跟她说她可以回家了
今晚就只有我们了

translation.en: [Maya] We cooked!
-We did. -[Alex] Charlie cooked.
-I helped. -[Alex] No, you didn't.
-[Maya] Yes, I did! -No, you didn't.
-Yes, I did! -Alex, we all cooked.
translation.zh:
-不 我有！
-亚历克斯 是我们一起煮的

translation.en: Why are you being weird, Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你为什么怪怪的？

translation.en: I'm not. [chuckles]
-We're making something special. -It's his mom's recipe.
translation.zh:
-我们做了一餐很特别的饭
-是他妈妈的秘方

translation.en: -Come. -Yummy!
Sit, relax. Enjoy the "Mayor of Humdrum Falls."
translation.zh:
坐下 放松一下
观赏《哈姆德拉姆佛斯的镇长》

translation.en: Should we get your mom to play Mop Hopsley?
translation.zh:
要不要让你们妈妈
来扮演莫普霍普斯利？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
Alex…
Maya, please come here.
-Why? -'Cause I'm asking you to. Come here.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-因为我让你们过来 过来

translation.en: I don't want to.
Hey, go to your mom.
Get over here.
Get over here right now!
But why? I'm having fun.
translation.zh: 可为什么啊？我玩得正开心呢

translation.en: Go to your room. Go.
translation.zh: 回到你们房间去 去吧

translation.en: [Maya] Why is she so angry?
[Alex] I don't know.
So I'm guessing you heard.
Yeah.
She say why?
They fired me because I wrote the wrong dates on my application form apparently.
translation.zh:
他们把我开除了
就因为我申请表上的日期写错了

translation.en: Oh.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
[Charlie] It's been a wacko day.
It's been a wacko couple of months. Actually it's… Ugh.
translation.zh: 最近几个月都很疯狂 其实是…

translation.en: You know, I wasn't even meant to be working here.
translation.zh: 我本来不是来这里工作的

translation.en: I took this job because I wanted to be close to my kids.
translation.zh:
我接受这份工作是因为
我想离我的孩子近点

translation.en: Then when I get here, she won't even let me see them,
translation.zh:
可我来到这里后
她连见都不让我见她们

translation.en: and then she starts making up this insane stuff about poisoning the dog,
translation.zh: 然后她开始编瞎话 说我给狗下毒

translation.en: and then this, you know…
I think the universe hates me, Amy.
translation.zh: 我觉得是老天爷恨我 艾米

translation.en: -Really. -Charlie--
-At this point. -You know that's not true.
I'm really sorry this happened to you.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉 这种事发生在你身上

translation.en: No, please. I'm sorry, 'cause I know you've still got three more weeks,
translation.zh:
不用这样 我才抱歉呢
因为我知道你还有三周时间

translation.en: and I'm not gonna be there to help.
translation.zh: 可我却没办法在院里帮你了

translation.en: But I can… I can help here.
I can, like, look after them, I can make sure you eat.
translation.zh: 我可以照顾她们 可以保证你有饭吃

translation.en: Anything you need.
Really. Anything.
[sighs] That's all right.
[sighs] Did I tell you Alex blew up the other day?
translation.zh:
我有没有告诉你
前两天亚历克斯发火了？

translation.en: -No. -Yeah.
She just lost it.
She was crying and screaming, and, like… [exhales] She's really struggling.
translation.zh: 她当时又哭又喊 十分挣扎

translation.en: I'm working so much, so…
translation.zh: 我工作太忙了 所以…

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I mean, you know, it's a lot, you know?
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我知道 确实不容易

translation.en: But what I think would be really helpful to me is, um…
translation.zh: 对我来说真正需要的是

translation.en: if I could spend some time alone with them, you know?
translation.zh: 让我和她们多待在一起

translation.en: Just me and the girls.
And I feel really bad saying this to you,
translation.zh: 我知道现在跟你说这种话真的不合适

translation.en: because I know that this has been a day from hell for you.
translation.zh: 因为我知道你今天也非常难受

translation.en: I mean, Charlie, honestly, you've had the year from hell. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 老实说 查理 你这一年简直糟透了

translation.en: No.
And, um…
God, I wish I could be there for you.
translation.zh: 我真希望我能在你身边

translation.en: -I just feel like shit. I'm so sorry. -No.
translation.zh: 可我感觉糟透了 实在太对不起了

translation.en: Amy, stop. I get it. Please.
translation.zh: 不 艾米 别说了 我懂 别说了

translation.en: It's… It's your kids. They need this.
translation.zh: 她们是你的孩子 她们需要你

translation.en: Yeah.
And you're a good mom.
-[chuckles weakly] -No, look at me.
You're a good mom.
-Okay. -I'm glad I can help.
Promise me you'll eat.
-It smells good. -[chuckles]
It's my mom's recipe, you know.
-Okay. -You know what?

forget who you were to me.
